subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} – a bird. Compare {{zh-l|*鳥|bird}}, of similar development.

subSections.title: Etymology
Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=wū,wù
|m_note="wù" - only used in {{zh-l|烏拉}}
|c=wu1
|h=pfs=vû;gd=vu1
|md=ŭ
|mn=o͘
|mn-t=ou1/u1
|mn-t_note=ou1 - vernacular; u1 - literary
|w=1u
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n,a
}}
